title: Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947)
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A –
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A – 
Temporary Requirements) (Covid-19 Passenger Locator Form) (Amendment) 
Regulations 2021.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited health act 1947 (section 31a - temporary requirements) (covid-19 passenger locator form) (amendment) regulation 2021

title: Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947)
heading: 2. The Health Act 1947 (Section 31A – Temporary Requirements)
text_raw:
2. The Health Act 1947 (Section 31A – Temporary Requirements) 
(Covid-19 Passenger Locator Form) Regulations 2021 (S.I. No. 45 of 2021) is 
amended, in Regulation 1(3), by the substitution of “the 31st day of August 
2021”for “the 9th day of June 2021”. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

8 June, 2021. 

STEPHEN DONNELLY, 
Minister for Health. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 11th June, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [277] 3

title: Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947)
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations extend until 31st August 2021 the effective date of S.I. No. 
45/2021 - The Health Act 1947 (Section 31A – Temporary Requirements) 
(Covid-19 Passenger Locator Form) Regulations 2021.
